verses.verse: Ahaz <S%H271><s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>; and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: and he <S%H6213>did<s%> not that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, like <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>;
but he walked <S%H3212>in<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> also molten <S%H4541>images<s%> for the <S%H1168>Baalim<s%>.

Moreover he burnt <S%H6999>incense<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom<s%>, and <S%H1197>burnt<s%> his <S%H1121>children<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%>, according to the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> whom <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> cast <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And he <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> and burnt <S%H6999>incense<s%> in the high <S%H1116>places<s%>, and on the <S%H1389>hills<s%>, and under every <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>.

Wherefore <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%>; and they <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H7617>him<s%>, and carried away of his a great <S%H1419>multitude<s%> of <S%H7633>captives<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>. And he was also <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, who <S%H5221>smote<s%> him with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%>.

For <S%H6492>Pekah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7425>Remaliah<s%> <S%H2026>slew<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, all of them <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H1121>men<s%>; because they had <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

And <S%H2147>Zichri<s%>, a mighty <S%H1368>man<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H5840>Azrikam<s%> the <S%H5057>ruler<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> that was <S%H4932>next<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> carried away <S%H7617>captive<s%> of their <S%H251>brethren<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>, <S%H802>women<s%>, <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and took also <S%H962>away<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H7998>spoil<s%> from <S%H935>them<s%>, and brought the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>.

But a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was <S%H8034>there<s%>, whose name was <S%H5752>Oded<s%>: and he went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6440>meet<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3068>them<s%>, Behold, because Jehovah, the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, was <S%H2534>wroth<s%> with <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, he hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and ye have <S%H2026>slain<s%> them in a <S%H2197>rage<s%> which hath reached <S%H5060>up<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.

And now ye <S%H559>purpose<s%> to keep <S%H3533>under<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> for <S%H5650>bondmen<s%> and <S%H8198>bondwomen<s%> unto <S%H7535>you<s%>: but are there not even with you <S%H819>trespasses<s%> of your own against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>?

Now <S%H8085>hear<s%> me <S%H7725>therefore<s%>, and send back the <S%H7633>captives<s%>, that ye have taken <S%H7617>captive<s%> of your <S%H251>brethren<s%>; for the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%> of Jehovah is upon <S%H3068>you<s%>.

Then <S%H582>certain<s%> of the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3076>Johanan<s%>, <S%H1296>Berechiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4919>Meshillemoth<s%>, and <S%H3169>Jehizkiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum<s%>, and <S%H6021>Amasa<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2311>Hadlai<s%>, stood <S%H6965>up<s%> against them that <S%H935>came<s%> from the <S%H6635>war<s%>,

and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H935>them<s%>, Ye shall not bring in the <S%H7633>captives<s%> <S%H559>hither<s%>: for ye purpose that which will bring upon us a <S%H819>trespass<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to <S%H3254>add<s%> unto our <S%H2403>sins<s%> and to our <S%H819>trespass<s%>; for our <S%H819>trespass<s%> is <S%H7227>great<s%>, and there is <S%H7227>fierce<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
So the armed <S%H2502>men<s%> <S%H5800>left<s%> the <S%H7633>captives<s%> and the <S%H961>spoil<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> that have been <S%H5344>mentioned<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and <S%H2388>took<s%> the <S%H7633>captives<s%>, and with the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> all that were <S%H4636>naked<s%> among <S%H3847>them<s%>, and arrayed <S%H5274>them<s%>, and shod <S%H398>them<s%>, and gave them to eat and to <S%H8248>drink<s%>, and <S%H5480>anointed<s%> <S%H5095>them<s%>, and carried all the <S%H3782>feeble<s%> of them upon <S%H2543>asses<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>, the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H8558>palm-trees<s%>, <S%H681>unto<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%>: then they <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>.
At that <S%H6256>time<s%> did <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> unto the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> to help <S%H5826>him<s%>.
For again the <S%H130>Edomites<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5221>smitten<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and carried <S%H7617>away<s%> <S%H7628>captives<s%>.

The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> also had <S%H6584>invaded<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H8219>lowland<s%>, and of the <S%H5045>South<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and had <S%H3920>taken<s%> <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh<s%>, and <S%H357>Aijalon<s%>, and <S%H1450>Gederoth<s%>, and <S%H7755>Soco<s%> with the <S%H1323>towns<s%> <S%H8553>thereof<s%>, and Timnah with the <S%H1323>towns<s%> <S%H1579>thereof<s%>, Gimzo also and the <S%H1323>towns<s%> <S%H3427>thereof<s%>: and they dwelt there.

For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3665>brought<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3665>low<s%> because of <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; for he had <S%H6544>dealt<s%> <S%H6544>wantonly<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> <S%H4604>sore<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
And <S%H8407>Tilgath-pilneser<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H6696>him<s%>, and distressed <S%H2388>him<s%>, but strengthened him not.

For <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> took away a <S%H2505>portion<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> and of the <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>: but it helped him <S%H5833>not<s%>.
And in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of his <S%H6887>distress<s%> did he <S%H4603>trespass<s%> yet <S%H3254>more<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, this same <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%>.

For he <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> unto the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>, which <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>; and he said, Because the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H5826>helped<s%> <S%H2076>them<s%>, therefore will I sacrifice to <S%H5826>them<s%>, that they may help <S%H3782>me<s%>. But they were the ruin of <S%H3478>him<s%>, and of all Israel.

And <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> gathered <S%H622>together<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and cut in <S%H7112>pieces<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and shut <S%H5462>up<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and he <S%H6213>made<s%> him <S%H4196>altars<s%> in every <S%H6438>corner<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And in every <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> high <S%H1116>places<s%> to burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and provoked to <S%H3707>anger<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of his <S%H1697>acts<s%>, and all his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, <S%H7223>first<s%> and <S%H314>last<s%>, <S%H3789>behold<s%>, they are written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, even in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; for they <S%H935>brought<s%> him not into the <S%H6913>sepulchres<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>stead<s%>.
